mapper.select: SELECT count(uid) AS yjtag FROM jejak.TMPLIST3 WHERE listid = #{uid} AND ycost = 0 AND (jm > 0 OR yb > 0)

SELECT a.uid, b.bcode, b.btype, c.sbsbph1, c.sbsbph2, c.sbsbph3, c.sbsbph4, c.sbsbjh1, c.sbsbjh2, c.sbsbjh3, c.sbsbjh4, c.sbsbpg1, c.sbsbpg2, c.sbsbpg3, c.sbsbpg4 FROM jejak.TMPLIST2 AS a, jejak.TMPLIST AS b, jejak.KSCBOOK0 AS c WHERE a.uid = #{uid} AND a.listid = b.uid AND b.bcode = c.sbbook LIMIT 1

SELECT a.crnum, a.bdate, a.m1, a.m2, a.m3, b.bnum, b.bname, b.bcode, b.bmyun, c.sbpanh, c.sbjanh, c.sbuprc, d.wcname FROM jejak.TMPLIST2 AS a, jejak.TMPLIST AS b, jejak.KSCBOOK0 AS c, jejak.KSWCUST0 AS d WHERE a.uid = #{uid} AND a.bucode = 0 AND a.listid = b.uid AND b.bcode = c.SBBOOK AND a.m1 = d.wccode
SELECT * FROM jejak.TMPLIST5 WHERE listid5 = #{uid} ORDER BY uid ASC
SELECT * FROM jejak.TMPLIST5 WHERE listid5 = #{bur_uid} ORDER BY uid ASC
SELECT * FROM jejak.TMPLIST3 WHERE listid = #{uid} ORDER BY uid ASC
SELECT * FROM jejak.TMPLIST3 WHERE listid = #{bur_uid} ORDER BY uid ASC
SELECT * FROM jejak.BITABLE7 WHERE crnum7 = #{uid} ORDER BY uid ASC
SELECT a.*, b.wcname FROM jejak.BITABLE8 AS a, jejak.KSWCUST0 AS b WHERE a.crnum8 = #{uid} AND a.ccode8 = b.wccode
SELECT * FROM jejak.BITABLE9 WHERE crnum9 = #{uid} AND bitag = 1
SELECT * FROM jejak.TWONGA WHERE jenum = #{uid} AND jabtag = 0
SELECT sthaly FROM jejak.KSCTABL0 WHERE stcudn LIKE '026' AND stdsdn LIKE #{sthaly}

SELECT a.uid, a.crnum, a.bdate, a.m1, a.m2, a.m3, b.bnum, b.bname, b.bcode, b.bmyun, b.btype, c.SBPANH, c.SBJANH, c.SBSBJH1,c.SBSBJH2, c.SBSBJH3, c.SBSBJH4, c.SBSBPH1, c.SBSBPH2, c.SBSBPH3, c.SBSBPH4, c.SBSBPG1, c.SBSBPG2, c.SBSBPG3, c.SBSBPG4, c.SBUPRC, d.wcname FROM jejak.TMPLIST2 AS a, jejak.TMPLIST AS b, jejak.KSCBOOK0 AS c, jejak.KSWCUST0 AS d WHERE a.uid = #{uid} AND a.listid = b.uid AND b.bcode = c.SBBOOK AND a.m1 = d.wccode

SELECT a.*, b.bnum, b.bname, b.bcode, b.bmyun, b.btype, c.SBPANH, c.SBJANH, c.SBSBJH1, c.SBSBJH2, c.SBSBJH3, c.SBSBJH4, c.SBSBPH1, c.SBSBPH2, c.SBSBPH3, c.SBSBPH4, c.SBSBPG1, c.SBSBPG2, c.SBSBPG3, c.SBSBPG4, c.SBUPRC, d.wcname FROM jejak.TMPLIST2 AS a, jejak.TMPLIST AS b, jejak.KSCBOOK0 AS c, jejak.KSWCUST0 AS d WHERE a.bdate > #{date1} AND a.bdate < #{date2} AND a.bucode = 0 AND a.listid = b.uid AND b.bcode = c.SBBOOK AND a.m1 = d.wccode ORDER BY a.crnum ASC
SELECT * FROM jejak.TMPLIST5 WHERE listid5 = #{uid} ORDER BY uid ASC
SELECT * FROM jejak.TMPLIST5 WHERE listid5 = #{bur_uid} ORDER BY uid ASC
SELECT * FROM jejak.TMPLIST3 WHERE listid = #{uid} AND gubn like '%본문%'
SELECT * FROM jejak.TMPLIST3 WHERE listid = #{bur_uid} ORDER BY uid ASC
SELECT * FROM jejak.TMPLIST2 WHERE (date_format(from_unixtime(bdate), '%Y%m%d') = #{date}) ORDER BY bdate ASC
SELECT * FROM jejak.TMPLIST3 WHERE listid = #{mrow} AND ycost = 0

SELECT a.uid, b.bcode, c.sbsbph1, c.sbsbph2, c.sbsbph3, c.sbsbph4 FROM jejak.TMPLIST2 AS a, jejak.TMPLIST AS b, jejak.KSCBOOK0 AS c WHERE a.uid = #{uid} AND a.listid = b.uid AND b.bcode = c.SBBOOK LIMIT 1
SELECT count(uid) AS yjtag FROM jejak.TMPJAB3 WHERE jbid = #{uid} AND ycost = 0 AND (jm > 0 OR yb > 0) AND jutag < 3

SELECT sobudan5, gubn5, panst5, sum(pannum5) AS pans, sum(sobu5) AS sobus, sum(sum5) AS sums, daeji5, filmnum5, filmdan5, filmcost5 FROM jejak.TMPJAB5 WHERE listid = #{uid} GROUP BY gubn5 ORDER BY uid ASC

SELECT yjcode, yjname, sum(jm) AS jms, sum(yb) AS ybs, gubn, colo, sum(rnum) AS rnums, sum(ycost) AS ycosts, sum(pcost) AS pcosts, pdanga FROM jejak.TMPJAB3 WHERE jbid = #{uid} GROUP BY gubn ORDER BY uid ASC
SELECT * FROM jejak.BIJAB7 WHERE crnum7 = #{uid} ORDER BY uid ASC
SELECT a.*, b.wcname FROM jejak.BIJAB8 AS a, jejak.KSWCUST0 AS b WHERE a.crnum8 = #{uid} AND a.ccode8 = b.wccode
SELECT * FROM jejak.TWONGA WHERE jenum = #{uid} AND jabtag = 1
SELECT * FROM jejak.TMPJAB5 WHERE listid = #{uid} ORDER BY uid ASC
SELECT * FROM jejak.TMPJAB3 WHERE jbid = #{uid} ORDER BY uid ASC
SELECT wjcode FROM jejak.KSWJIJL0 ORDER BY ib ASC, wjcode ASC
SELECT a.*, b.wjname FROM jejak.YONGJIMS AS a, jejak.KSWJIJL0 AS b WHERE a.msdate = #{msdate} AND a.yjcode = b.wjcode ORDER BY a.uid ASC
SELECT * FROM jejak.KSWJIJL0 ORDER BY ib ASC, wjcode ASC
SELECT * FROM jejak.KSWJIJL0 ORDER BY ib ASC, wjcode ASC
SELECT jicode, sum(tprice) AS psum, sum(num) AS nsum FROM jejak.JIINOUT WHERE (date_format(from_unixtime(date), '%Y%m') = #{bdate}) AND comment LIKE '入' GROUP BY jicode
SELECT uid FROM jejak.TMPJAB WHERE (date_format(from_unixtime(jbdate), '%Y%m') = #{bdate})
SELECT * FROM jejak.TMPJAB3 WHERE jbid = #{uid} AND jutag <> 3
SELECT uid FROM jejak.TMPLIST2 WHERE (date_format(from_unixtime(bdate), '%Y%m') = #{bdate})

SELECT a.jbname, b.uid, b.ycost FROM jejak.TMPJAB AS a, jejak.TMPJAB3 AS b WHERE (date_format(from_unixtime(a.jbdate), '%Y%m') = #{bdate}) AND a.uid = b.jbid AND b.yjcode = #{yjcode} ORDER BY a.uid ASC LIMIT 1

SELECT a.listid, b.uid, b.ycost FROM jejak.TMPLIST2 AS a, jejak.TMPLIST3 AS b WHERE (date_format(from_unixtime(a.bdate), '%Y%m') = #{bdate}) AND a.uid = b.listid AND b.jcode = #{yjcode} ORDER BY a.uid asc LIMIT 1
SELECT a.*, b.wjname FROM jejak.YONGJIMS2 AS a, jejak.KSWJIJL0 AS b WHERE a.msdate = #{msdate} AND a.yjcode = b.wjcode ORDER BY a.uid ASC
SELECT wjcode FROM jejak.KSWJIJL0 ORDER BY ib ASC, wjcode ASC
SELECT a.sbname, a.sbbook, a.sbinse, a.sbhj04, a.sbhjgb, a.sbuprc FROM jejak.KSCBOOK0 AS a WHERE a.sbjjgb = 1 AND a.${dbattr} > 0 ORDER BY a.sbbook ASC
SELECT distinct(sbjuja) FROM jejak.KSCBOOK0 WHERE sbjjgb = 1 AND sbinse > 0 ORDER BY sbjuja ASC
SELECT * FROM jejak.KSCBOOK0 WHERE SBJUJA LIKE #{jname} AND sbjjgb = 1 AND sbinse > 0 ORDER BY sbbook ASC
SELECT * FROM jejak.KSCBOOK0 WHERE SBJUJA LIKE #{jname} AND sbjjgb = 1 AND sbinse > 0 ORDER BY sbbook ASC
SELECT * FROM jejak.JEOJA WHERE name1 LIKE #{jname}

SELECT a.uid, b.bcode, b.bnum, c.sbinse, c.sbjjgb, c.sbjuja, c.sbuprc, c.sbbook, c.sbname FROM jejak.TMPLIST2 AS a, jejak.TMPLIST AS b, jejak.KSCBOOK0 AS c WHERE (date_format(from_unixtime(a.bdate), '%Y%m') = #{bdate}) AND a.listid = b.uid AND c.sbbook LIKE b.bcode AND c.sbjjgb = 0 AND c.sbinse != 0 ORDER BY a.bdate ASC

SELECT a.sbinse, a.sbbook, a.sbname, a.sbuprc, a.sbhjgb, (SELECT sum(s1qnty) FROM jejak.KS1${dbname}A WHERE s1gubn = 'C' AND s1book = a.sbbook) AS sum1, (SELECT sum(s1qnty) FROM jejak.KS1${dbname}A WHERE s1gubn = 'D' AND s1book = a.sbbook) AS sum2 FROM jejak.KSCBOOK0 AS a WHERE a.sbbook LIKE '12521%' OR a.sbbook LIKE '12522%' OR (a.sbbook >= '125340' AND a.sbbook <= '125390') OR (a.sbbook >= '125010' AND a.sbbook <= '125050') OR a.sbbook LIKE '31134%' ORDER BY a.sbbook ASC
SELECT * FROM jejak.IBTABLE2 WHERE idate LIKE #{bdate} ORDER BY t1id ASC, idate ASC, uid2 ASC
SELECT s1book, sum(s1qnty) AS s1qnty, sum(s1amnt) AS s1amnt FROM jejak.${dbname} WHERE s1gubn LIKE 'A' GROUP BY s1book ORDER BY s1book ASC
SELECT s1book, sum(s1qnty) AS sum1, sum(s1amnt) AS sum2, s1gubn FROM jejak.${dbname} GROUP BY s1book,s1gubn ORDER BY s1book ASC, s1gubn ASC
SELECT s1book, sum(s1qnty) AS sum1, sum(s1amnt) AS sum2, s1gubn FROM jejak.${dbname} WHERE s1gubn != 'A' GROUP BY s1book,s1gubn ORDER BY s1book ASC, s1gubn ASC

SELECT a.uid, a.bdate, a.crnum, a.bucode, b.bname, b.bcode, b.bnum , c.sbuprc, c.sbinse FROM jejak.TMPLIST2 AS a, jejak.TMPLIST AS b , jejak.KSCBOOK0 AS c WHERE a.bdate >= #{date1} AND a.bdate < #{date2} AND a.bucode = 0 AND a.listid=b.uid AND b.bcode >= "125210" AND b.bcode <= "125391" AND c.sbbook LIKE b.bcode ORDER BY a.crnum DESC
